properties.address: Chapel (Priest Room) at St Peter's Church, Lamerton, Devon PL19 8RW
properties.description: A warm space for anyone who is looking for a space to be warm and enjoy some company. We serve the villages of Lamerton, Milton Abbot, Chillaton, Marystowe, Coryton and Sydenham Damerel, but welcome anybody from the surrounding area. Open fortnightly from 10th January. (On the alternate weeks, there is a Saturday coffee morning in the Lamerton Community Hall.)
properties.title: Coffee & Company

properties.description: A friendly warm cafe space is open during the Food Hub every Wednesday from 11.30 12.30.
properties.title: Kings

properties.description: A cafe run by volunteers from local churches and local community, for everyone to enjoy freshly cooked food at affordable prices. Only open on Fridays from 10am until 2pm, last orders 1.30pm.
properties.title: Lower Deck Cafe

properties.description: Tavistock Food Hub offers a warm and welcoming space with free hot and cold drinks and snacks plus a delicious homemade soup or vegetarian hot meal (we ask for a small donation towards the cost of food but that is optional)
properties.title: Tavistock Food Hub (Weds)

properties.description: Open from 17-10-2022. We aim to offer a Warm Welcome that is inclusive and friendly
properties.title: Tavistock Parish Church

properties.address: Parish Rooms St Eustachius, Tavistock, Devon PL 19 8AU
properties.description: All welcome. Opens at 10.00 -14.00hrs. Homemade soup, baguettes, cheese, cakes/biscuits and plenty of coffee and tea. Chat, read the paper, puzzles or just feel welcomed in a warm space. Free!
properties.title: Warm Welcome
